A discovery of false teachers and hypocritical preachers. Crossley, Thomas.
4 p.
These are to be sold over against the Rose and Crown at Puddle-dock in London, [London] : [1692]
Caption title. Signed at end: Dated Aug. the 20th, 1692. Thomas Crossley. Imprint from colophon. Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
